alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 10:23AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Cass and Richland Counties. Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. Maple River near Enderlin affecting Cass and Ransom Counties. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Walhalla affecting Cavalier and Pembina Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River at Harwood. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 91.0 feet, MAJOR FLOOD. BNSF railroad line may need to be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 76.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning and continue rising to 91.3 feet early Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 84.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
